name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (RyanCK)
description:
Feel like an old-school hacker as you attempt to crack passwords using an old WM2000 terminal!

There are three levels of difficulty; the player may attempt to solve encrypted passwords for a nearby school, a Fortune 500 company, or even a CIA database!  This is all fictional, of course, and no real passwords are being used.  This is a fun game for passing time and keeping your mind sharp.  

Developed in Unity 2D.
